      • getDomainName

        public static java.lang.String getDomainName(java.lang.String url)
        Returns the domain name of the provided URL
        If the provided URL is "http://www.cs.cmu.edu", the returned string will be "cs.cmu.edu"
        Parameters:
        url - URL provided
        Returns:
        Domain Name

      • getParentURL

        public static java.lang.String getParentURL(java.lang.String url)
        Returns the parent URL of the provided URL. The returned parent URL will be used to join with the resource in the same location
        Parameters:
        url - Input URL
        Returns:
        Parent URL of the provided URL

      • getRootURL

        public static java.lang.String getRootURL(java.lang.String url)
        Returns the root URL of the provided URL.
        Parameters:
        url - Input URL
        Returns:
        Root URL for the input

      • addURLToValidSchemaSet

        public static boolean addURLToValidSchemaSet(java.util.Map<SchemaConstants.Schema,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> urls,
                             java.lang.String url)
        Adds the provided URL into appropriate schema bucket based on the name of the URL and title of its html page
        Parameters:
        urls - URL buckets
        url - URL to be added
        Returns:
        true if the URL is successfully added or if the URL is invalid, false otherwise. If true is returned, the URL will not be crawled further

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Test driver for the utility methods
        Parameters:
        args - cmd line arguments
